title: Sexual and gender-based violence among adolescents and young adults in refugee settlements and host communities: A case of Palorinya Refugee Settlement in Obongi District, Uganda
content:
Publication date: December 2024

Source: Public Health, Volume 237

Author(s): Nazarius Mbona Tumwesigye, Claire Biribawa, Cissie Namanda, Edson Mwebesa, James Muhumuza, Tumwine Muzamiru, Charles Luwaga, Russell Dowling, Moses Otai
